item.title: CVE-2021-21361|2024-08-03T18:09:15.934Z -- jlleitschuh -- security-research
item.description: The `com.bmuschko:gradle-vagrant-plugin` Gradle plugin contains an information disclosure vulnerability due to the logging of the system environment variables. When this Gradle plugin is executed in public CI/CD, this can lead to sensitive credentials being exposed to malicious actors. This is fixed in version 3.0.0.
